original_text: You are afraid of wars here, but I will cause wars to hurt you in Egypt. You worry that you might be hungry here, but I will make you hungry in Egypt. Finally, you will die in Egypt.
korean_text: 너희가 두려워하는 칼이 애굽 땅으로 따라가서 너희에게 미칠 것이요 너희가 두려워하는 기근이 애굽으로 급히 따라가서 너희에게 임하리니 너희가 거기에서 죽을 것이라

sentences.original_text: You are afraid of wars here
but I will cause wars to hurt you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 당신을 상하게 할 전쟁을 일으킬 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You worry that you might be hungry here
but I will make you hungry
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 당신을 굶주리게 할 것입니다
